name: Mech Stroller
description:
HTML VERSION HERE! - UPDATED!

note: Due to crashes updated downloadable JAR file

Mech Stroller brings back an old classic walk and shoot your way through wave attacks.

Battle against several enemy types while not letting your gun overheat!

Made in just over a week by Careless Labs this demo lets you test out the early prototype. If enough people like this then the whole game will be rewritten and loads more features added.

Please vote for our game!

Controls
A - Left
D - Right
Space - Shoot
LMB - Shoot
Mouse - Aim

Run right between waves
